rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. Features Bohemian decor with artistic wall finishes, ambient lighting and natural textures.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, reclaimed wood countertops and a mix of vintage and modern decor.
Spacious area for relaxation and entertainment. Adorned with colorful Bohemian fabrics, eclectic furniture and indoor plants.
Cozy dining space that seamlessly connects with the living and kitchen areas. Features a long wooden table for gatherings.
Private gym area designed with functional equipment layout. Includes space for cardio, strength training and yoga.
Open balcony overlooking the garden. Features planters and seating area to enjoy the outdoor views.

openings.description: Large main entrance aligned with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow. Complemented by a decorative facade.
Ample window in the kitchen area providing natural light and ventilation, promoting well-being as per Vastu guidelines.
Door leading to the balcony offering a seamless transition to the garden and fresh air.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with Bohemian design elements, featuring comfortable seating and ample storage. Designed in accordance with Vastu to maximize energy flow.
Well-ventilated bathroom with natural light and open design. Incorporates Vastu recommendations to ensure good flow.
Compact study area with built-in shelves and a workspace designed for productivity. Features Bohemian accents and a relaxed atmosphere.

openings.description: Large window in the bedroom providing ample natural light and enhancing Vastu energy.
Door connecting study with the rest of the floor for easy accessibility while maintaining privacy.

garden.description: Large garden surrounding the bungalow with native plants, seating areas and pathways following a natural layout. Designed to complement the Bohemian aesthetic while respecting Vastu principles.
